description: A research grade portable minirhizotron system for capturing high-resolution 360° images of fruit tree root systems in field conditions
full_summary:
# Tender Announcment

## WS 4132981525: Portable Minirhizotron System

### Solicitation Number
WS4132981525

### Publication Date
2023-10-27

### Tender Closing Date
2023-11-24T14:00:00

### Status
* **Eng**: Canceled
* **Fra**: Annuled

### Need Description
The Summerland Research and Development Centre of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada in Summerland, British Columbia, requires the supply and delivery of one (1) new, research-grade portable minirhizotron system. The portable equipment will be used to capture high-resolution 360° in-situ images of fruit tree root systems for short-term and long-term observation of root growth and behavior, and rootstock phenotyping. 

### Contract Specifications
* **Category**: General Government Services
* **Method**: Competitive and Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Contract Duration**: From an expected start date of null to an expected end date of 2025-03-29

### Delivery and Delivery Location
The system will be delivered to the Summerland Research and Development Centre, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada.

### Contact Information
* **Name**: Chris Morton (he-him)
* **Email**: [chris.morton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chris.morton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information
Please visit https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17839154?extsite=MTc4MzkxNTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== for the official notification and additional details.
